What to say when slaughtering or sacrifi.ARABIC_TEXT: ((بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ [اللَّهُمَّ مِنْكَ وَلَكَ] اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنِّي)).
What to say when slaughtering or sacrifi.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Bismil-lah wallahu akbar, allahumma minka walak, allahumma taqabbal  minnee.)
What to say when slaughtering or sacrifi.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (In the name of Allah, and Allah is the greatest.  O Allah, (it is) from You and belongs to You, O Allah, accept this from me.)
